#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#define ll unsigned long long int
using namespace std; 

 
int hasArrayTwoCandidates(ll A[], ll arr_size, ll sum)
{
   ll l, r;
 
    /* Sort the elements */
    sort(A,A+ arr_size);
 
    /* Now look for the two candidates in the sorted 
       array*/
    l = 0;
    r = arr_size-1; 
    while(l < r)
    {
         if(A[l] + A[r] == sum)
              return 1; 
         else if(A[l] + A[r] < sum)
              l++;
         else // A[i] + A[j] > sum
              r--;
    }    
    return 0;
}
 
/* Driver program to test above function */
int main()
{
    ll A[10005],n,k,i;
    cin>>n>>k;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    cin>>A[i];
    
    if( hasArrayTwoCandidates(A, n, k))
        printf("Yes\n");
    else
        printf("No\n");
 
    return 0;
}
